items.content_html: A Todo List App, JSON Server is a lightweight and simple backend server that facilitates the development and testing of web applications by providing a RESTful API based on JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) data. It acts as a mock server, allowing developers to simulate a real API without the need for a fully-fledged backend.
items.title: Oyefolu-CodeWizard/Todo-List: A Todo List App,  JSON Server is a lightweight and simple backend server that facilitates the development and testing of web applications by providing a RESTful API based on JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) data. It acts as a mock server, allowing developers to simulate a real API without the need for a fully-fledged backend.
